observation: KRINNER USA Webshop - Buy christmas tree stands online – Krinner USA  Skip to content TREE STANDS GARDEN LIGHTS Press Service FAQ Comparison Table Shipping, Returns & Warranty Cart Your cart is empty Free Shipping EXplore our collection View ALL KRINNER tree stand comfortable set up OUR TREE GENIE Good Morning America "The best Christmas tree stands you can buy this holiday season" "The best Christmas tree stands" "We think everyone who plans to install a Christmas tree should buy this stand." "The best option to get your real tree secured and ready to decorate." "When it’s time to assemble your Christmas tree for the holidays, opt for this large stand from Krinner." ABOUT US KRINNER USA, Inc. – the US subsidiary of KRINNER Germany – was founded in March 2002 and is managed by Helen Buck-Ferdinand in Chicago and Mr. Karsten Eibach in Germany READ MORE About the shop MORE INFORMATION Company Terms Of Use Imprint Do not sell my personal information Navigation © Krinner USA Powered by Shopify American Express Apple Pay Diners Club Discover Meta Pay Google Pay Mastercard Shop Pay Visa

observation: [{'url': 'https://www.nytimes.com/wirecutter/reviews/krinner-tree-genie-stand-review/', 'content': "The Krinner Tree Genie XXL, which has been Wirecutter's pick since 2012, can support tree trunks with a maximum diameter of 7 inches and a maximum height of 12 feet."}, {'url': 'https://www.wsj.com/buyside/home/krinner-tree-genie-review-01670879543', 'content': 'The object of my seasonal self-indulgence was a Krinner Tree Genie, a German-made Christmas tree stand. At less than $100 for the medium size—capable of holding a tree up to 7 feet high—it was ...'}, {'url': 'https://thriftyniftymommy.com/krinner-tree-stand-review/', 'content': 'In 1987, a man named Klaus Krinner invented a Christmas tree stand. Shortly after receiving the patent for his invention Mr. Krinner founded the company in Strasskirchen, lower Bavaria, Germany.
